Texas Regattas

Find sailboat races and regattas happening across Texas throughout the year.

Texas Centerboard Circuit

The Texas Centerboard Circuit hosts races across Texas for centerboard sailboats. A great way to race your dinghy or small keelboat at different lakes throughout the season.

View TCC Schedule →

Texas Yacht Clubs

Austin Yacht Club

Lake Travis racing with regular Wednesday and weekend regattas.

Rush Creek Yacht Club

Lake Ray Hubbard racing near Dallas with active one-design fleets.

Lake Canyon Yacht Club

Canyon Lake racing with beautiful Hill Country scenery.

Fort Worth Boat Club

Eagle Mountain Lake racing in the DFW metroplex.

Houston Yacht Club

Galveston Bay racing with both one-design and handicap fleets.

Corinthian Sailing Club

White Rock Lake racing in Dallas with junior and adult programs.

View Full Racing Calendar

Access our complete Texas regatta schedule and racing information on the legacy site.

View Full Calendar →

Get Started Racing

New to racing? Most yacht clubs welcome new members and offer crew opportunities for beginners.
